parameters.name: NewValue
parameters.description: Value for this dimension in the units of owning document

parameters.name: WhichConfigurations
parameters.description: Configurations in which to set this value as defined in swSetValueInConfiguration_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Names of the configurations for which to set dimension values (see Remarks )

title: IDimension.SetValue3
description: Sets the values of the dimensions in the specified configurations.
signature:
System.Int32 SetValue3( 
   System.Double
NewValue
,
   System.Int32
WhichConfigurations
,
   System.Object
Config_names
)

parameters.name: NewValue
parameters.description: Value for this dimension in the units of owning document

parameters.name: WhichConfigurations
parameters.description: Configurations in which to set this value as defined in swSetValueInConfiguration_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Names of the configurations for which to set dimension values (see Remarks )

returns: Error code as defined in swSetValueReturnStatus_e
remarks: The Config_names argument is only used if WhichConfigurations is set to swSetValue_InSpecificConfigurations and can contain either a BSTR array or a single BSTR.
